tool_description: Evaluates color stability and bleeding risk for different fiber and dye combinations under various conditions.

dye_method.description: Dyeing method used (natural, synthetic, acid, basic, reactive)

error_messages: Unknown fiber type: Fiber type must be a recognized natural or synthetic fiber.
Invalid dye method: Dye method must be one of: natural, synthetic, acid, basic, or reactive.
Invalid color intensity: Color intensity must be one of: light, medium, dark, or very_dark.
Unsupported condition: Expected conditions must be from: washing, sunlight, heat, friction, water, perspiration.
usage: Specify fiber_type, dye_method, color_intensity, and expected_conditions array. The tool evaluates how well the color will hold up under specified conditions and provides recommendations for maintaining color integrity.

light_fastness.description: Resistance to fading from light exposure (1-10)

bleeding_risk.description: Risk of color bleeding (minimal, low, moderate, high)

recommendations.description: Specific care recommendations to preserve color

expected_longevity.description: Expected color lifespan (excellent, good, fair, limited)
